scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: [service] <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;expire=200 Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0
